nodes.text: Ari was a fair-skinned female Sephi. At one point in history, she fought with dual long knives. She had dark eyes, sported long red hair, and favored light clothing that left her unhampered in her movements.

Ari was created by the Star Wars artist HOON during the conceptual research for the 2004 Dark Horse comic Jedi: Yoda, written by Jeremy Barlow. A piece of concept art of the character used to appear on Hoon's website, but Ari herself was absent from the final release of Jedi: Yoda.
